name: 真乃
text: はぁーっ……
trans: Hhaa...

name: 真乃
text: ほわっ、息が真っ白……
trans: Hwa! My breath is all white...

name: 灯織
text:
……確かに
今日は、いつもより冷えるね
trans:
......You're right. 
It's chillier than usual today.

name: めぐる
text:
お仕事に来る時は、こんな寒くなるなんて
思わなかったよー
trans: When I left for work today, I didn't think it'd get this cold!

name: 真乃
text: お昼はお日様が出てたから、ちょっとあたたかかったもんね
trans: Well, it was a little warmer during the day, when the sun was still out.

name: 灯織
text:
そうだね、日があるうちはよかったけど、
暗くなって、急に冷え込んだみたい……
trans: Yeah, it wasn't all that bad in the sun. Seems like the temperature took a nosedive once it got dark, though...

name: 灯織
text: でも、まだ風が吹いてなくてよかっ──
trans: But we shouldn't be complaining, at least the wind isn't──

name: めぐる
text:
さ、さ、寒ーい！
耳がピリピリするよーっ
trans:
I'm F-F-FREEZING!
My ears are all tingly!

name: 真乃
text:
めぐるちゃん、大丈夫？
ほんとに風が冷たかっ──
trans:
Are you okay, Meguru-chan?
That gust of wind just now was really co──

name: 真乃
text: ほわ……は、はっ……──
trans: Hwa....a-a──

name: 真乃
text: ──くしゅっ
trans: ──choo!

name: めぐる
text:
ま、真乃こそっ！　大丈夫……？
今ので、体冷えちゃったかな……
trans:
M-Mano... I should be asking you! You okay?
Did the wind get into your clothes...?

name: 灯織
text:
風邪ひかないように気を付けないと……
帰ったらあたたかくして休まないとだね
trans:
Be careful you don't catch a cold...
Once you get home, make sure to get plenty of rest in a warm bed, okay?

name: 真乃
text:
うん、ありがとう
めぐるちゃん、灯織ちゃん
trans: I will. Thanks, Meguru-chan, Hiori-chan.

name: 真乃
text:
寒くて、くしゃみ出ちゃった……
もう１枚、何か着てくればよかったなぁ
trans:
Sorry, I had to sneeze because of the cold... 
I wish I was wearing an extra layer...

name: めぐる
text:
あっ、確かに！
いっぱい服を着ればあったかいもんねっ
trans:
Aah, good thinking! 
Just wear tons of clothes, that'll keep you warm!

name: めぐる
text:
シャツでしょ、セーターでしょ、それにトレーナー！
ジャンパーに、帽子に──
trans: Like, a shirt, and a pull-over and then a sweater on top of that! And a jacket, and a beanie, and──

name: 灯織
text:
……そこまでしなくても
首元、覆うだけでも違うよ、めぐる
trans:
......That might be a little much. 
Just covering your neck makes a big difference, Meguru.

name: めぐる
text: あっ！　そっか、マフラーも忘れちゃダメだよねっ
trans: Ah! How could I forget? Throw in a warm scarf as well!

name: 灯織
text: そうじゃなくて……
trans: That's not really what I...

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふっ
なんだか、鳥さんみたい
trans:
......Heehee.
We'd end up like birds, kind of.

name: めぐる
text: えっ、なになに？　どういうこと真乃？
trans: Huh? What do you mean, Mano?

name: 真乃
text:
あっ……えっとね、
寒くなると、鳥さんはもこもこってなるの
trans:
Ah... well, you see...
Birds fluff up when they feel cold.

name: 灯織
text:
……もこもこ？　そういえば、
街の鳩も、膨らんでるの見たことある……
trans: ......Fluff up? Now that you mention it, I think I've seen street pigeons looking all puffed up...

name: 真乃
text:
うん、鳥さんたちは寒い時、
羽毛を膨らませてあったかくするんだって
trans: Yeah. They fluff up their feathers when it's cold outside to keep themselves warm, apparently.

name: めぐる
text:
あー、わかった！
鳥はそうやって服を着込んでるんだー！
trans:
Ah, gotcha! 
It's their way of dressing warm, huh!

name: 灯織
text:
……私、てっきり冬を過ごすために
たくさん食べてるからだと思ってた……
trans: .....I thought they just looked like that from eating a lot, to prepare for the winter...

name: 真乃
text: ふふ、私も昔はそう思ってたよ
trans: Heehee, I used to think that too.

name: 真乃
text:
ピーちゃんもね、この時期に日向ぼっこをすると
白くてまあるい大福みたいに、ふわ〜ってなるんだ
trans: Even Pii-chan does it, you know. When he's sun-bathing around this time of the year, he becomes real fluffy, like a big, round, white rice cake.

name: 真乃
text:
公園にいる鳩さんたちも、寒い中でも
まるっとしてふわふわしたまま集まってたりして
trans: The pigeons in the park, too. They huddle together looking all round and fluffy.

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ、仲がいいなぁ、可愛いなぁって思って……
見てると、とってもほわぁってなるんだ
trans:
Heehee, they seem so close when they do that, and it's so cute...!
It's really comfy just watching them.

name: 灯織
text:
ふふ……
見てみたいかも
trans:
Heh...
I kind of want to see that.

name: めぐる
text:
うんうん！　真乃のお話だけでもすっごく可愛いっ
それに、とってもあったかそう！
trans: Yeah, yeah! It sounds real cute just listening to how you're talking about them, Mano! And real warm, too!

name: めぐる
text: あっ、わたし……いいこと思い付いたかもっ
trans: Ah! So... I just had a brainwave, kinda!

name: めぐる
text: ──ねぇねぇ！　真乃、灯織！
trans: ──Hey, hey! Mano, Hiori!

name: 灯織
text: え？　わっ……
trans: Huh? Woah...!

name: 真乃
text: ほわっ
trans: Hwa!

name: めぐる
text:
こうやって、くっついたら
ぽかぽかしてくるんじゃないかなっ？
trans: Think we'll feel warmer if we cuddle up like this?

name: 灯織
text:
め、めぐる……！
また、急に抱き着いて──
trans:
M-Meguru...!
There you go again, hugging people out of the blue──

name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……
めぐるちゃん、あったかい……
trans:
Hwa...
Meguru-chan, you're so warm...

name: めぐる
text:
えへへっ、でしょでしょ？
わたしね、よく体温高いねって言われるの
trans:
Ehehe, aren't I?
You know, everyone always says I have a high body temperature.

name: めぐる
text:
だから、真乃がお話ししてくれた鳩みたいにくっついたら
ふたりに体温をおすそ分けできるかなって思ったんだ
trans: So I figured I could share some of that with the two of you, if we huddle together like the pigeons you were talking about.

name: 灯織
text: もう、めぐるったら……
trans: Oh, come on, Meguru...

name: 灯織
text: ……でも、すっごく温かい……
trans: ......You're right, though. It's really warm...

name: めぐる
text: うんっ、真乃と灯織と一緒にわたしもぽかぽかしてる……
trans: Yeah, and I get to feel nice and warm along with you and Mano...

name: めぐる
text: えへへ、嬉しいなぁっ！
trans: Ehehe, this is pretty good...!

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふっ、
今、私たち鳩さんだね
trans:
......Heehee.
I guess we're pigeons now.

name: 灯織
text: ……ふふ、そうだね……
trans: ......Heh, yeah...

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんとめぐるちゃんといると
いつも楽しいな……）
trans: (There's never a dull moment when I'm with Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan...)

name: 真乃
text:
（冬は、寒くてお外に出る機会が少なくなっちゃうけど
ふたりと一緒だと寒さも気にならないくらい）
trans: (It's cold out in winter, so I don't get to spend as much time outdoors. But when I'm together with the two of them, I hardly even feel the cold.)

name: 真乃
text:
（こうやって、お話ししたりお出かけしたり……
この先もいっぱいしていきたいなっ）
trans:
(Just talking, hanging out with them like today...
I want to keep on doing that, lots and lots!)
